FuncDef: This command enables the sending of interface ID options in the DHCPv6 relay packet.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that the ASCII-encoded concatenated tuple is used which consists of the access-node-identifier, service-id, and interface-name, separated by "|".
Specifies that the interface index is used. The If Index of a router interface can be displayed using the show>router>interface>detail command.
Specifies that the SAP identifier is used.
Specifies that a string is used.
